title: An Act establishing a special commission to ensure the safety and sustainability of non-profit public events

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Vitolo of Brookline, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2724) of Tommy Vitolo relative to establishing a special commission (including members of the General Court) to ensure the safety and sustainability of non-profit public events.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 07/24/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Hearing rescheduled to 07/24/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                           and Virtual
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Discharged to the committee on House Rules
